SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

jsx.client
Class Browser

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.client.Browser

public final class Browser
extends Disposable

A utility class accessing the properties of JsWindow.navigator.

Users are encouraged to use the utilities provided by this class instead of the opaque methods of JsNavigator in consideration of the reuse benefit for re-compilation results.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Method Detail

userAgent

public static final boolean userAgent(java.lang.String s)

Determines whether the userAgent of the current browser case-insensitively contains a specified string.

Parameters:
s - A string.
Returns:
true if the userAgent of the current browser case-insensitively contains s, false otherwise.
Since:
1.0
